articles.author: Ivan Levingston
articles.title: Blockbuster M&A deals more than double in first quarter - Financial Times
articles.description: Dealmaking drought left behind as first-quarter transaction values rise 30% with European market standing out
articles.content:
Blockbuster deals more than doubled in the first quarter of this year, signalling a nascent recovery in the mergers and acquisitions market following a lengthy drought.
The number of takeovers worth… [+3381 chars]
